title: East-bound train service delayed due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 轨道故障导致东行列车服务延误
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan kereta api ke arah timur tertangguh kerana kerosakan landasan
title_translations.ta: தடக் கோளாறு காரணமாக கிழக்கு நோக்கிச் செல்லும் ரயில் சேவை தாமதமானது

updates.text: Train service between Tampines and Pasir Ris delayed in both directions due to track fault.
UPDATE:East-bound train service running smoothly again.
East-bound train service from Tampines to Pasir Ris delayed due to track fault.
